home.title: Welcome
home.introduction: This is an introduction in English.

offline.title: Offline

secret.title: Super secret page
secret.introduction: If you try to access this URL not connected, you will be redirected to the home page (server-side or client-side)

authentication.introduction:
I am the secret content, I am shown only when the use is connected.

You can also refresh this page, you'll still be connected!
authentication.loginTitle: Please login to see the secret content!
authentication.userhint: To login, use demo as username and demo as password.
